Today in Pembrokeshire, it's looking poor with 6 ft @8s SW swell and fresh 23 mph SSW winds making it blown out. Tomorrow, conditions improve slightly to 5 ft @12s WSW with moderate 15 mph SSW winds, offering some workable options at spots like Whitesands Bay. Day after, the swell holds at 6 ft @10s WSW but remains poor with 19 mph WSW winds. Best: tomorrow.
